trans-unit.source: Push notifications are normally sent in a back-end service like Mobile Apps or ASP.NET using a compatible library.
trans-unit.target: Push notifications are normally sent in a back-end service like Mobile Apps or ASP.NET using a compatible library.

trans-unit.source: You can also use the REST API directly to send notification messages if a library is not available for your back-end.
trans-unit.target: You can also use the REST API directly to send notification messages if a library is not available for your back-end.

trans-unit.source: Here is a list of some other tutorials you may want to review for sending notifications:
trans-unit.target: Here is a list of some other tutorials you may want to review for sending notifications:

trans-unit.source: Azure Mobile Apps : For an example of how to send notifications from an Mobile Apps backend integrated with Notification Hubs, see [Add Push Notifications to your iOS App](../articles/app-service-mobile/app-service-mobile-ios-get-started-push.md).
trans-unit.target: Azure Mobile Apps : For an example of how to send notifications from an Mobile Apps backend integrated with Notification Hubs, see [Add Push Notifications to your iOS App](../articles/app-service-mobile/app-service-mobile-ios-get-started-push.md).

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET : [Use Notification Hubs to push notifications to users](../articles/notification-hubs/notification-hubs-aspnet-backend-ios-notify-users.md).
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET : [Use Notification Hubs to push notifications to users](../articles/notification-hubs/notification-hubs-aspnet-backend-ios-notify-users.md).

trans-unit.source: Azure Notification Hub Java SDK: See [How to use Notification Hubs from Java](../articles/notification-hubs/notification-hubs-java-backend-how-to.md) for sending notifications from Java.
trans-unit.target: Azure Notification Hub Java SDK: See [How to use Notification Hubs from Java](../articles/notification-hubs/notification-hubs-java-backend-how-to.md) for sending notifications from Java.

trans-unit.source: This has been tested in Eclipse for Android Development.
trans-unit.target: This has been tested in Eclipse for Android Development.

trans-unit.source: PHP: [How to use Notification Hubs from PHP](../articles/notification-hubs/notification-hubs-php-backend-how-to.md).
trans-unit.target: PHP: [How to use Notification Hubs from PHP](../articles/notification-hubs/notification-hubs-php-backend-how-to.md).

trans-unit.source: In the next section of the tutorial, you will learn how to use the [Notification Hub REST interface](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windowsazure/dn223264.aspx) to send the notification message directly in your app.
trans-unit.target: In the next section of the tutorial, you will learn how to use the [Notification Hub REST interface](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windowsazure/dn223264.aspx) to send the notification message directly in your app.

trans-unit.source: All registered devices receive the notification sent by any device.
trans-unit.target: All registered devices receive the notification sent by any device.
